scripts.deploy-user-api: pnpm install && pnpm -C services/user-cdk run deploy
scripts.deploy-image-api: pnpm install && pnpm -C services/image-cdk run deploy
scripts.deploy-all: pnpm deploy-rds && pnpm migrate-rds && pnpm deploy-user-api && pnpm deploy-image-api && pnpm deploy-cloudfront && pnpm deploy-ui
